title: Warivo forays into high-speed e-scooter segment, eyes Rs 120 crore topline in FY25
description: Warivo Motor India aims to nearly double its revenue to Rs 120 crore this fiscal by entering the high-speed electric scooter market. The company has launched the CRX scooter, priced at Rs 79,999, and plans to introduce more high-speed models while continuing with low-speed scooters to meet market demand.
